<title level="1" right="Rules">[Reactions](/Rules.aspx?ID=2023)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Reactions use this symbol: <actions string="Reaction" />. These actions can be used even when it's not your turn. You only get one reaction per encounter round, and you can use it only when its specific trigger is fulfilled. Often, the trigger is another creature's action.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
